entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
